key.name: main-mount-point
key.summary: Main mount point to display in panel
key.description: The mount point that will be displayed in the top panel indicator

key.name: hidden-mount-points
key.description: Mount points that should be hidden from the popup menu

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to update disk space information

key.name: use-binary-units
key.description: If true, use binary units (KiB, MiB, GiB). If false, use decimal units (KB, MB, GB)

key.name: indicator-display-mode
key.description: How to display the indicator: "icon" (only icon), "label" (only label), or "both" (icon and label)
